metadata.title: CVE-2024-32458 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description: FreeRDP is a free implementation of the Remote Desktop Protocol. FreeRDPbased clients that use a version of FreeRDP prior to 3.5.0 or 2.11.6 arevulnerable to out-of-bounds read. Versions 3.5.0 and 2.11.6 patch theissue. As a workaround, use `/gfx` or `/rfx` modes (on by default, requireserver side support).

criterions.comment: freerdp2 package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
